title: Blame It On The Boogie
lyrics:
[intro] (D) (Bm7) (Em7) (A7sus4)  x2
 
My (Bm7)baby’s always dancin’… and it (D)wouldn’t be a bad thing
But (Bm7)I don’t get no lovin’… and (G7)that’s no (D7)lie
We (Bm7)spent the night in Frisco… at (D7)every kind of disco
(G7)From that night I kissed our love good(A7sus4)bye
 
[chorus]
Don’t blame it on the (Bm7)sunshine
Don’t blame it on the (Bb)moonlight
Don’t blame it on the (C)good times
Blame it on the (D)boogie
Don’t blame it on the (Bm7)sunshine
Don’t blame it on the (Bb)moonlight
Don’t blame it on the (C)good times
Blame it on the (D)boogie
 
That (Bm7)nasty boogie bugs me… but (D)somehow it has drugged me
(Bm7) spellbound rhythm gets me (G7)on my (D7)feet
I’ve (Bm7) changed my life completely, I’ve (D7)seen the lightning leave me
And my (G7)baby just can’t take her eyes off (A7sus4)me
 
[chorus]
Don’t blame it on the (Bm7)sunshine
Don’t blame it on the (Bb)moonlight
Don’t blame it on the (C)good times
Blame it on the (D)boogie
Don’t blame it on the (Bm7)sunshine
Don’t blame it on the (Bb)moonlight
Don’t blame it on the (C)good times
Blame it on the (D)boogie
 
(D)I just can’t (Bm7)I just can’t
(Em7)I just can’t con(A7sus4)trol my feet  x4
 
[chorus]
Don’t blame it on the (Bm7)sunshine
Don’t blame it on the (Bb)moonlight
Don’t blame it on the (C)good times
Blame it on the (D)boogie
 
This (Bm7)magic music grooves me… that (D)dirty rhythm fools me
The (Bm7)devil’s gotten to me (G7)through this (D7)dance
I’m (Bm7)full of funky fever… a (D7)fire burns inside me
(G7)Boogie’s got me in a super (A7sus4)trance
 
[chorus]
Don’t blame it on the (Bm7)sunshine
Don’t blame it on the (Bb)moonlight
Don’t blame it on the (C)good times
Blame it on the (D)boogie
 
[a cappella/rhythm only]
Sunshine… moonlight… good times… boogie… x2
 
[chorus]
Don’t blame it on the (Bm7)sunshine
Don’t blame it on the (Bb)moonlight
Don’t blame it on the (C)good times
Blame it on the (D)boogie
 
[outro] (D) (Bm7) (Em7) (A7sus4)  x2
(Bm7-single strum) [end]
